Located in Yanille, the Tower guard is another of the many kinds of guards. However, these guards cannot be pickpocketed. They are around the city and some are located in the Watchtower.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Tower guards appear to be wearing a shield made of steel, but does not resemble a kiteshield or square shield and so is unobtainable by players. instead, the shape of the shield bears resemblance to that of the wooden shield.
